# This directory contains processed transaction data
# Data is partitioned by year/month/day in Parquet format

# Example structure:
# processed/
#   transactions/
#     year=2024/
#       month=12/
#         day=01/
#           part-00000.snappy.parquet
#   daily_summary/
#   merchant_summary/

# Generated by: scripts/etl_pipeline.py
